perturbation.original_text: Employees must submit harassment claims within 15 days. Converge may change the Converge Support Personnel on written notice to VNE; provided, however, that Converge shall use reasonable efforts not to change the Converge Support Personnel more frequently than once every 30 days. All replacement personnel shall be required to participate in Support Training as described in Section 3.3 below. Converge Support Personnel will be the "single point of contact" for the Maintenance and Support Services provided by VNE under this Section 2.
perturbation.changed_text: Employees must submit harassment claims within 2 days. Converge may change the Converge Support Personnel on written notice to VNE; provided, however, that Converge may change the Converge Support Personnel as frequently as they want, but not exceed more than once every 5 days. All replacement personnel shall be required to participate in Support Training as described in Section 3.3 below. Converge Support Personnel will be the "single point of contact" for the Maintenance and Support Services provided by VNE under this Section 2.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires employees to submit harassment claims within 15 days. This has been modified to 2 days, contradicting state laws like California, which require at least 30 days for harassment claims. The original text states Converge shall use reasonable efforts not to change the Converge Support Personnel more frequently than once every 30 days. This has been modified to 5 days which increases the frequency of changes.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California law requires at least 30 days for harassment claims.

perturbation.original_text: VNE will create a document entitled, "Environment and Deployment Process." This document will detail the recommended Supported Product environments and the build and deployment process for the Supported Products. VNE agrees to complete a draft of this document for Converge's review within 30 days following the Effective Date. Converge agrees to review and provide final comments on this draft document within 30 days after receipt thereof. Both parties shall use commercially reasonable efforts to reach a mutual agreement on the document and execute the final document within 90 days following the Effective Date.
perturbation.changed_text: VNE will create a document entitled, "Environment and Deployment Process." This document will detail the recommended Supported Product environments and the build and deployment process for the Supported Products. VNE agrees to complete a draft of this document for Converge's review within 180 days following the Effective Date. Converge agrees to review and provide final comments on this draft document within 1 day after receipt thereof. Both parties shall use commercially reasonable efforts to reach a mutual agreement on the document and execute the final document within 10 days following the Effective Date.
perturbation.explanation: The timeline for Converge to review and provide final comments on the draft document has been shortened to just 1 day, which is insufficient for a thorough review. The deadline for VNE to complete a draft document has been extended to 180 days, which unreasonably delays the project's progress, conflicting with typical standards for efficient project management.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of good faith and fair dealing.

perturbation.original_text: Thereafter, Converge shall pay each such Monthly Installment to VNE no later than the first day of each month during the Initial Term (November 2001 and through March 2003). All such Monthly Installments are non-refundable.
perturbation.changed_text: Thereafter, Converge shall pay each such Monthly Installment to VNE no later than the last day of each month during the Initial Term (November 2001 and through March 2003). All such Monthly Installments are refundable.
perturbation.explanation: The payment term has been changed from the first day of the month to the last day, which could cause cash flow issues for VNE and change the existing structure of the agreement. Also, the modified text makes the monthly installments refundable, which contradicts the original agreement and can cause uncertainty in revenue projections.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of contract - Changing key payment terms.
